questions.question: What is React Native?
options: A programming language for building mobile apps
A framework for building web applications
An open-source framework for building native mobile apps
A tool for creating cross-platform desktop applications
questions.correctAnswer: An open-source framework for building native mobile apps

questions.question: What is the basic building block of UI in Android and iOS development?
What language is used to create React Native components?
What is the primary benefit of using Native Components in React Native?
options: They provide a consistent look and feel across platforms
They offer better performance than custom components
They are easier to learn and use
They are more secure than custom components
questions.correctAnswer: They provide a consistent look and feel across platforms

questions.question: What is the purpose of the <View> component in React Native?
options: To provide a container for other components
questions.correctAnswer: To provide a container for other components
